SEARCH
Module edu.upc.subgrupprop113.supermarketmanager
Package edu.upc.subgrupprop113.supermarketmanager.dtos

Class ProductDto

java.lang.Object
edu.upc.subgrupprop113.supermarketmanager.dtos.ProductDto
public class ProductDto extends Object
Data Transfer Object (DTO) representing a Product

This class is used to encapsulate and transfer product data, including its attributes, keywords for categorization, and related products information.

    • ProductDto

      public ProductDto(String name, float price, String temperature, String imgPath, List<String> keywords, List<RelatedProductDto> relatedProducts)
      Constructs a `ProductDto` with the specified attributes.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the product.
      price - the price of the product.
      temperature - the temperature category of the product.
      imgPath - the file path to the product's image.
      keywords - the list of keywords associated with the product.
      relatedProducts - the list of related products.
